content: tail for sewing place the cockscomb starting from the back of cocca s head round 23 cocca the hen by thecrochettisti wings x2 white yarn r1 start 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 r2 increase in all 6 st 12 r3 single_crochet increase repeat 6 times 18 r4 2 single_crochet increase repeat 6 times 24 slip_stitch to finish off leaving a long tail sew only half of the wings to the body instagram @thecrochettisti enjoy this pattern this pattern is for personal use only and can not be sold or distributed in any form you are allowed to sell dolls or creations made following the pattern in this case please credit thecrochettisti thank you cocca the hen by thecrochettisti
